channel.title: Idaho Falls|Bonneville County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Idaho Falls|Bonneville County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Bus. BL-15 South/US-26 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on Bus. BL-15 South/US-26 West. Distance to Shelley (via US-91), Blackfoot, and Pocatello.

item.title: US-26 West/BL-15 South at US-91
item.description: US-26 West/BL-15 South (Yellowstone Highway) at US-91. Turn right on Sunnyside Road to continue west on US-26, BL-15 South, and for I-15. Continue straight on Yellowstone Highway for US-91. This is the beginning of US-91 southbound.

item.title: US-26 West/Bus. US-20 West at BL-15
item.description: US-26 West/Bus. US-20 West at BL-15/Bus. US-20 (Broadway) in Idaho Falls. Turn right for Bus. US-20 West/BL-15 North - Arco (via US-20). Continue straight for US-26 West/BL-15 South/Blackfoot/Pocatello.

item.title: US-26 West/Bus. US-20 West - Idaho Falls
item.description: US-26 West/Bus. US-20 West at F St. in Idaho Falls. Merge left to continue on US-26 West/Bus. US-20 West.

item.title: US-26 West at Bus. US-20
item.description: US-26 west at Bus. US-20 in Idaho Falls. Turn right for Bus. US-20 East/Lewisville Road. Continue straight for US-20 West/Bus. US-20 West/Idaho Falls/Pocatello.

item.title: US-26 West/BL-15 South at I-15
item.description: US-26 west/BL-15 south at I-15 Exit 116. Use I-15 north for Idaho Falls and Butte. Use I-15 South/US-26 West for Blackfoot and Pocatello.

item.title: End US-91 North at US-26/BL-15
item.description: Northern end of US-91 north at US-26 and BL-15. US-91 was recently extended, when US-26 was rerouted to the new Exit 116 interchange on I-15.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 116
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 116 - BL-15/US-26/Ammon/Jackson.

item.title: US-20 West at I-15 South
item.description: US-20 west at I-15 south to Arco and Pocatello. US-20 west joins I-15 south. Continue straight for the Idaho Falls Airport.

item.title: US-20 West - Lindsay Blvd
item.description: US-20 west at Lindsay Blvd (Exit 307). Approaching end of freeway at I-15 to Butte and Pocatello.

item.title: US-26 East at BL-20
item.description: US-26 East/BL-20 East routes divide. Continue east on US-26 to Swan Valley and Jackson. Take BL-20 east to US-20 towards West Yellowstone.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching BL-20 Split
item.description: US-26 East/BL-20 East routes divide. BL-20 East heads north to US-20 towards West Yellowstone. US-26 continues east towards Swan Valley and Jackson.

item.title: BL-20 East/BL-15 South at US-26
item.description: BL-20 East/BL-15 South (Broadway) at US-26/BL-20/BL-15 (Yellowstone) south to Blackfoot and Pocatello - north to Jackson (WY).

item.title: BL-20/BL-15 Approaching US-26
item.description: BL-20 East/BL-15 south (Broadway) approaching US-26/BL-26/BL-15 (Yellowstone) in downtown Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-20 East at I-15 North (Exit 119)
item.description: Grandview Drive at I-15 north to Roberts and Butte (Montana). Continue straight for US-20 east to West Yellowstone.

item.title: US-20 West at I-15 South Onramp
item.description: End Bus. US-20 west at I-15 south onramp to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Continue west on US-20 for Arco.

item.title: US-20 West at I-15 South (Exit 118)
item.description: US-20 west at I-15 South to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Continue west on US-20 for Arco and the Department of Energy (INL) Site.

item.title: End Bus. US-20/BL-15 at I-15/US-20 Jct.
item.description: End Bus. US-20/BL-15 at I-15/US-20 Jct. Merge right for I-15 North/US-20 East to Roberts and Butte (Montana). Proceed under overpass for I-15 South to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Continue west on Broadway for US-20 West to Arco.

item.title: End Bus. US-20 at I-15 and US-20
item.description: End Bus. US-20 east at I-15/US-20. Turn right for I-15 North/US-20 East to Roberts and Butte (Montana). Use I-15 south to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Continue west on US-20 for Arco.

item.title: End BL-15/Bus. US-20 at I-15 and US-20
item.description: End BL-15/Bus. US-20 at I-15/US-20 on Broadway in Idaho Falls.

item.title: Bus. US-20 West Approaching US-20 and I-15
item.description: Bus. US-20 West approaching US-20 and I-15 in Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-20 West at I-15 South (Exit 118)
item.description: End Bus. US-20 west at I-15 south to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Continue east on US-20 for DOE (Department of Energy - Idaho National Laboratory) Site and Arco.

item.title: I-15 North Exit 118 and Exit 119
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 118, BL-15/US-20 West/Bus. US-20/Historic Downtown, and approaching Exit 119, US-20 East/Rigby/West Yellowstone, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 118
item.description: I-15 north approaching BL-15/US-20 West/Bus. US-20/Idaho Falls/Historic Downtown, 1 mile.

item.title: I-15 North Exit 119
item.description: I-15/US-20 north at Exit 119, US-20 East/Rigby/W. Yellowstone(MT).

item.title: I-15 North Exit 119 Offramp at US-20 East
item.description: I-15 north offramp at US-20 east to Rexburg, Rigby, and W. Yellowstone, and the Idaho Falls Airport.

item.title: US-20 East - Lindsay Blvd. Exit
item.description: US-20 east at Lindsay Blvd., approaching Riverside Drive exit.

item.title: US-20 East - Riverside Dr Exit
item.description: US-20 east at Riverside Drive/City Center exit

item.title: US-20 East - Science Center Dr Exit
item.description: US-20 east approaching Science Center Drive exit, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-20 East - Science Center Dr Exit
item.description: US-20 east at Science Center Drive exit.

item.title: US-20 East at I-15
item.description: US-20 east at I-15 south to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Approaching I-15 North to Butte and W. Yellowstone.

item.title: US-20 East at I-15
item.description: US-20 east at I-15 south to Blackfoot and Pocatello. Approaching I-15 North to Butte and W. Yellowstone.

item.title: US-20 East at I-15 North, and BL-15
item.description: US-20 east at I-15 North/US-20 East to Butte,MT and W. Yellowstone, MT, and BL-15/BL-20/To US-26 to Jackson, WY.

item.title: US-20 East Exit 310
item.description: US-20 east approaching Exit 310, US-20 Bus./Lewisville/Idaho Falls, exit 1 mile.

item.title: US-20 East Exit 310
item.description: US-20 east at Exit 310, US-20 Bus./Lewisville/Idaho Falls.

item.title: I-15 Exit 119 Offramp at US-20
item.description: I-15 North offramp Exit 119 - US-20 East/Rigby/West Yellowstone.
